shòu
to sell; to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)
продавать; составить или осуществить (план, интрига и т. д.)

purpleculture_examples:
销售 [ xiāo shòu ]: to sell; to market; sales (representative, agreement etc)
出售 [ chū shòu ]: to sell; to offer for sale; to put on the market
零售 [ líng shòu ]: to retail; to sell individually or in small quantities
销售额 [ xiāo shòu é ]: sales figure; total income from sales; turnover
售价 [ shòu jià ]: selling price

humanum_full_description_en:
From the " mouth ", "雔" to save the sound. The original meaning is to sell. "Shu Wen Xin Attached": "Sell, sell it. From the mouth, save the sound. "Poetry" said: Jia Yong does not sell." Such as "Xunzi. Confucianism: "For those who are precious, you can’t wear clothes, you can’t eat, and you can’t sell them. But why are you rich?" "Not for sale" means that you cannot sell quickly . Another example is "Han Feizi. "Speaking of the Forest": "When the horse of a thousand miles is one, its benefits are slow; the horses are sold every day, and its benefits are urgent."

" Selling " by extension means getting married. Such as "The Biography of Ancient Lies. "Zhong Lichun": "(Zhong Lichun) is forty years old, with no room to live in, dazzling marriage is not for sale, and abandonment is not insisting." Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Negative Salary": "Furthermore, he suffered from chaotic marriage but never sold. Counsel."

" Sale " also refers to exams and exams. For example, Han Yu of the Tang Dynasty "Sacrifice to Zhang Yuan from the Ministry of Yu": "Where to live in Zhenwu, all are recommended by guests, Siwo Mingxue, Shi Weibangyan, each sold in literature, fortunately all young." Pu Songling in Qing Dynasty "Liao Zhai" Zhiyi. "Jia Feng's Pheasant": "Ye Feng's Pheasant, a native of Pingliang, was only famous for a while, but it was not sold after trial."

" Sale " means realization and implementation. Such as "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi's "Xijing Fu": "Creating gu with evil spirits, so it's not for sale." Xue Zong's note: "Selling, it's still good. It is said that if you are holding an unrighteous way, you can't do it." For example, in the Southern Song Dynasty, Lu You "Shu Anji Fahou": "There is a quack doctor in Yuezhou called Lin Biao.

" Sell " also means to buy. For example, Liu Zongyuan of the Tang Dynasty: "Ask the price and say: "Only four hundred." I will sell it with pity." Shen Kuo of the Northern Song Dynasty, "Mengxi Bi Tan." "Painting and Calligraphy": "Many collectors of calligraphy and painting take empty names. Occasionally, they are Zhong, Wang, Gu, and Lu's pens. Those who see it compete for sale."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " mouth ", "雔" to save the sound. The original meaning is to sell.
humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「雔」省聲。本義是賣出去。《說文新附》：「售，賣去手也。从口，雔省聲。《詩》曰：賈用不售。」如《荀子．儒效》：「彼寶也者，衣之不可衣也，食之不可食也，賣之不可僂售也，然而人謂之富，何也？」「不可僂售」意謂不能迅速賣出去。又如《韓非子．說林下》：「千里之馬時一，其利緩；駑馬日售，其利急。」

　　「售」引申表示嫁出去。如《古列女傳．辯通傳》：「（鍾離春）年四十，無所容入，衒嫁不售，流棄莫執。」唐代杜甫〈負薪行〉：「更遭喪亂嫁不售，一生抱恨長咨嗟。」

　　「售」又指考試及第。如唐代韓愈〈祭虞部張員外文〉：「往在貞兀，俱從賓薦，司我明試，時維邦彥，各以文售，幸皆少年。」清代蒲松齡《聊齋志異．賈奉雉》：「頁奉雉，平涼人，才名冠一時，而試輒不售。」

　　「售」表示實現、實行。如《文選．張平子〈西京賦〉》：「挾邪作蠱，於是不售。」薛綜注：「售，猶行也，謂懷挾不正道者，於是時不得行也。」又表示應驗。如南宋陸游〈書安濟法後〉：「越州有庸醫曰林彪，其技不售，乃冒法代它醫造安濟。」

　　「售」亦表示買。如唐代柳宗元〈鈷鉧潭西小丘記〉：「問其價，曰：『止四百。』余憐而售之。」北宋沈括《夢溪筆談．書畫》：「藏書畫者多取空名，偶傳為鍾、王、顧、陸之筆，見者爭售。」
humanum_short_description: 從「口」，「雔」省聲。本義是賣出去。

售字的基本解释

售
shòu
卖：售货。售票。出售。销售。零售。
施展：以售其奸。其计不售。
卖销

售字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shòu］
［《廣韻》承呪切，去宥，禪。］
(1)卖出；卖。
(2)买。
(3)引申指酬谢。
(4)推行；施展；实现。
(5)指女子得嫁。
(6)指科举及第。

售字的英文翻译

◎ 售
carry out, sell

售字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　售； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页193第15
【唐韻】承臭切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】承呪切，?音授。【說文】賣去手也，从口雔省聲。【廣韻】賣物出手。【詩·邶風】賈用不售。【戰國策】賣僕妾，售乎閭巷者，良僕妾也。　又【集韻】與讎同。【詩·大雅】無言不讎。【箋】敎令之出如賣物，物善則其售賈貴，物惡則其售賈賤。【前漢·宣帝紀】每買餅，所從買家，輒大讎。【註】師古曰：讎讀曰售。　又【集韻】神六切，音孰。儥也。　又【韻會】時流切，音酬。【古樂府·隴頭水歌】將頓樓蘭膝，就解郅支裘。勿令如李牧，功多信不售。

考證：〔【戰國策】賣僕妾，售乎關巷者，〕　謹照原文關巷改閭巷。
售字的源字形

售字的起名意思

卖，卖出去。

(2) Buy.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 for sale; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 193 15
【Tang Yun】Cheng Xiqie 【Jiyun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】Cheng Guqie, taught by sound. [Said the text] You can sell your hands, and save your voice from your mouth. [Guang Yun] Sell things. [Poetry·Bei Feng] Not for sale. [Warring States Policy] Sell servant concubines, those who sell in Luxiang, also good servant concubines.　[Jiyun] is the same as 雠. 【Poetry·Daya】Speaking without words. [Note] Orders are like selling things, good things are expensive, and bad things are cheap. [Pre-Han·Xuan Di Ji] Every time you buy a cake, the buyer is always the same. [Note] Shigu said: Yudu said for sale.　[Jiyun] God has six cuts, which sounds. Amusing.　[Rhyme Club] Time flow and cut, music will be paid. [Guyuefu·Longtou Shuige] When you stop Loulan, you will solve Zhizhiqiu. Don't make it like Li Mu, don't sell it for more credit. Textual research: [[Warring States Policy] Selling servants and concubines, selling to Guanxiang,] 　 I would like to change Guanxiang to Luxiang according to the original text.

Sell
Name meaning
Sell, sell.
售
形声字。口表意,表示开口叫卖;罐(chou )省声,讎为双鸟,有多而可分之意,表示东西多则可售卖。本义是卖出去。
①卖:~货|出~|零~。②达到;施展:以~其奸。
~价 ~卖 ~聲 ~缺 ~完 代~ 兜~ 发~

Продавать
Пиктофонетические символы.
Рот выражает смысл, что означает открытие для продажи; jar (chou) сохраняет звук, а 雠 - двойная птичка, что означает, что их много, но их можно разделить, что означает, что можно продать больше вещей.
Первоначальное значение - продать.
①Продать: ~ товаров | вне ~ | ноль ~.
②Достичь; показать: с ~ его злом.
